name: Vionix the tomcat adventure - chapter 1
description:
Vionix the tomcat adventure - chapter 1

Best played in fullscreen!

Play this new story with Vionix and experience a new adventure!

-Story-

After hearing an old legend about a ruby that can destroy the world, Vionix goes to the Crack Castle and tries to find the hidden portal that can transport you to a jungle temple, where the ruby is.

But, Mr. Wincker watches his every move, and he will try to take the ruby, before Vionix does. What can he do?

-Gameplay-

Explore the hills and the castle, with beautiful and nostalgic graphics, inspired by some old games.

Avoid the obstacles and the robots. If you lose, you must to restart the whole game .

Follow the tips and solve the puzzles to continue on your journey.

Try not to fall when you are moving from a platform to another platform.

Follow this steps and you will win easilly.

-Credits-

Editing: Alight Motion, Power Director. 

Created with Construct 3
